description: Try our easy to follow Pork Stir Fry with Shredded Wombok & Fried Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stir-fry,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Pork,Low sugar
name: Pork Stir Fry with Shredded Wombok & Fried Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red capsicum, deseeded, cut into strips
1.25 cup oil (oil for deep frying, save 0.25 cup for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine stock, hoisin and soy sauce in a bowl. Set aside.
Cut rind from pork rashers and cut into thick strips.
Heat a large wok on a high heat. Add half the pork and stir-fry until golden. Remove and set aside. Repeat with remaining pork.
Add oil and stir-fry onion and ginger for 2 minutes. Add capsicum, snow peas and wombok and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Return pork to wok and stir in sauce mixture. Toss over heat for 2 minutes or until heated through.
Fry vermicelli noodles in hot oil until puffed.
